languages.text: {n}Инквизитор устало вздыхает.{/n} "Вы не даете мне забыть, что я имею дело с Вольным Торговцем. Хорошо, в знак доброй воли я также окажу вашему протекторату значимую поддержку. Но с этого момента я жду от вас ответного содействия".

traits.locale_text: {n}Инквизитор устало вздыхает.{/n} "Вы не даете мне забыть, что я имею дело с Вольным Торговцем. Хорошо, в знак доброй воли я также окажу вашей торговой империи значимую поддержку. Но с этого момента я жду от вас ответного содействия".

languages.text: {n}He sighs wearily.{/n} "You won't let me forget that I am dealing with a Rogue Trader, I see. Very well, as a sign of my goodwill, I will also provide substantial support to your protectorate. But from this point on, I will be expecting your cooperation in return."
languages.original_text: {n}Инквизитор устало вздыхает.{/n} "Вы не даете мне забыть, что я имею дело с Вольным Торговцем. Хорошо, в знак доброй воли я также окажу вашему протекторату значимую поддержку. Но с этого момента я жду от вас ответного содействия".

traits.locale_text: {n}He sighs wearily.{/n} "I see you are not letting me forget that I am dealing with a Rogue Trader. Very well, as a sign of my goodwill, I will also provide substantial support to your trade empire. But from this point on, I am expecting your cooperation in return."

{n}He sighs wearily.{/n} "I see you are not letting me forget that I am dealing with a Rogue Trader. Very well, as a sign of my goodwill, I will also provide substantial support to your trade empire. But from this point on, I am expecting your cooperation in return."

{n}He sighs wearily.{/n} "You won't let me forget that I am dealing with a Rogue Trader, I see. Very well, as a sign of my goodwill, I will also provide substantial support to your trade empire. But from this point on, I will be expecting your cooperation in return."

{n}He sighs wearily.{/n} "You won't let me forget that I am dealing with a Rogue Trader, I see. Very well, as a sign of my goodwill, I will also provide substantial support to your trade empire. But from this point on, I will be expecting your cooperation in return."

{n}He sighs wearily.{/n} "You won't let me forget that I am dealing with a Rogue Trader, I see. Very well, as a sign of my goodwill, I will also provide substantial support to your protectorate. But from this point on, I will be expecting your cooperation in return."

languages.text: {n}カルカサルはうんざりした様子でため息を吐く。{/n}「お前と話していると、自由開拓者と話をしているのだと忘れそうになるな。いいだろう、私の善意の証に、お前の保護領を実質的に支援してやろう。だが取り計らってやるからには、お前の協力も得られるものと期待しているぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}He sighs wearily.{/n} "You won't let me forget that I am dealing with a Rogue Trader, I see. Very well, as a sign of my goodwill, I will also provide substantial support to your protectorate. But from this point on, I will be expecting your cooperation in return."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルはうんざりした様子でため息を吐く。{/n}「お前と話していると、自由開拓者と話をしているのだと忘れそうになるな。いいだろう、私の善意の証に、お前の保護領を実質的に支援してやろう。だが取り計らってやるからには、お前の協力も得られるものと期待しているぞ」

languages.original_text: {n}He sighs wearily.{/n} "You won't let me forget that I am dealing with a Rogue Trader, I see. Very well, as a sign of my goodwill, I will also provide substantial support to your protectorate. But from this point on, I will be expecting your cooperation in return."

languages.text: {n}他疲惫地叹了一口气。{/n}“好吧，你总是在提醒我，我是在和行商浪人打交道。我明白了，为了表达我的诚意，我愿意为你的王朝提供实质性的支持。不过从现在开始，我希望你能报以同等诚意，与我合作。”
languages.original_text: {n}He sighs wearily.{/n} "You won't let me forget that I am dealing with a Rogue Trader, I see. Very well, as a sign of my goodwill, I will also provide substantial support to your protectorate. But from this point on, I will be expecting your cooperation in return."

traits.locale_text: {n}他疲惫地叹了一口气。{/n}“好吧，你总是在提醒我，我是在和行商浪人打交道。我明白了，为了表达我的诚意，我愿意为你的王朝提供实质性的支持。不过从现在开始，我希望你能报以同等诚意，与我合作。”

languages.text: {n}Suspira, cansado.{/n} «Veo que no voy a poder olvidar que estoy tratando con un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. De acuerdo. Como muestra de mi buena voluntad, también proporcionaré un apoyo considerable a su protectorado. Sin embargo, a cambio espero que coopere desde este mismo instante».
languages.original_text: {n}He sighs wearily.{/n} "You won't let me forget that I am dealing with a Rogue Trader, I see. Very well, as a sign of my goodwill, I will also provide substantial support to your protectorate. But from this point on, I will be expecting your cooperation in return."

traits.locale_text: {n}Suspira, cansado.{/n} «Veo que no voy a poder olvidar que estoy tratando con un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. De acuerdo. Como muestra de mi buena voluntad, también proporcionaré un apoyo considerable a su protectorado. Sin embargo, a cambio espero que coopere desde este mismo instante».

languages.text: {n}Il pour un long soupir de lassitude.{/n} « J'avais presque oublié que je traitais avec {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}... Très bien, en gage de bonne volonté, je m'engage à apporter un soutien substantiel à votre protectorat. Mais en retour, j'espère pouvoir compter sur votre totale coopération à l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: {n}He sighs wearily.{/n} "You won't let me forget that I am dealing with a Rogue Trader, I see. Very well, as a sign of my goodwill, I will also provide substantial support to your protectorate. But from this point on, I will be expecting your cooperation in return."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il pour un long soupir de lassitude.{/n} « J'avais presque oublié que je traitais avec {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}... Très bien, en gage de bonne volonté, je m'engage à apporter un soutien substantiel à votre protectorat. Mais en retour, j'espère pouvoir compter sur votre totale coopération à l'avenir. »

languages.text: {n}Er seufzt müde.{/n} "Ich sehe schon, Ihr müsst mich daran erinnern, dass ich es mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} zu tun habe. Also schön, als Zeichen meines guten Willens werde ich Eurem Protektorat substanzielle Unterstützung zukommen lassen. Aber ab sofort erwarte ich dafür auch Eure Kooperation."
languages.original_text: {n}He sighs wearily.{/n} "You won't let me forget that I am dealing with a Rogue Trader, I see. Very well, as a sign of my goodwill, I will also provide substantial support to your protectorate. But from this point on, I will be expecting your cooperation in return."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er seufzt müde.{/n} "Ich sehe schon, Ihr müsst mich daran erinnern, dass ich es mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} zu tun habe. Also schön, als Zeichen meines guten Willens werde ich Eurem Protektorat substanzielle Unterstützung zukommen lassen. Aber ab sofort erwarte ich dafür auch Eure Kooperation."

languages.text: {n}Yorgun bir nefes veriyor.{/n} "Bir Hür Tacir'le konuştuğumu unutmama izin vermeyeceksin anlaşılan. Pekâlâ, iyi niyetimin bir diğer göstergesi olarak protektorana maddi destek de sağlayacağım. Ancak bu andan itibaren karşılığında benimle iş birliği içinde olmanı bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}He sighs wearily.{/n} "You won't let me forget that I am dealing with a Rogue Trader, I see. Very well, as a sign of my goodwill, I will also provide substantial support to your protectorate. But from this point on, I will be expecting your cooperation in return."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yorgun bir nefes veriyor.{/n} "Bir Hür Tacir'le konuştuğumu unutmama izin vermeyeceksin anlaşılan. Pekâlâ, iyi niyetimin bir diğer göstergesi olarak protektorana maddi destek de sağlayacağım ancak bu noktadan itibaren karşılık olarak benimle iş birliği içinde olmanı bekliyorum."
